property_description:
INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY - FINISH IT
**Duplex Apartment or 2-Studio Apartments for Renovation**

This property is located in the heart of Casares Pueblo, just 1 minute from Plaza España and only a few minutes from free parking in the garage. It is conveniently close to bakeries, the supermarket, the pharmacy, restaurants and cafes.

The two floors of the apartment are similar in size. Both have castle- and mountain views.
Each floor has approximately 26 m² of space.

This property has enormous potential and is offered at a fair sale price.

**Renovation Budget**
The estimated renovation budget is between €60,000 and €70,000, depending on the finishes and layout chosen.
The architect and constructor are ready to go.



CASARES PUEBLO - THE BEST OF ANDALUCIA'S TWO WORLDS

Living in Casares, surrounded by its spectacular nature, guarantees tranquility and authenticity, as well as all the services the town offers, with the entire Costa del Sol and everything it has to offer literally at your feet.

The town of Casares provides various amenities for its residents, including a large communal pool and tennis courts, making it an ideal place for enjoying outdoor activities with family and friends.

This property will be perfect as a permanent family home or for those looking to start a vacation rental business. Its location and the stunning views make this house a unique opportunity for living or investing in one of the most charming destinations on the Costa del Sol.

property_description:
Tourist Apartment for Sale in the PierVacanz Complex – Manilva (Málaga)
For Tourist Use Only – Not for Residential Living

Apartment for sale in the prestigious PierVacanz holiday complex, just a few minutes from the beaches of Manilva.
This property is strictly for tourist use only and does not allow permanent residence.


---

Main Features:

Fully furnished and air-conditioned apartment, located in a complex with a swimming pool, communal areas, reception, and 24-hour security.

The owner may use the apartment during the low season, by paying €150 per week of personal use.

Private rentals are not permitted. Tourist rental management is handled exclusively by PierVacanz, and the contract cannot be modified.

Furniture and interior layout cannot be altered.

This is a pure investment opportunity, ideal for buyers seeking passive income through professionally managed tourist rentals.



---

Important:

Permanent residence is not allowed.

Ideal investment in one of the most attractive coastal areas of the Costa del Sol, with strong tourist demand.

High occupancy during the season and good estimated profitability.



---

Contact us for:

Detailed floor plans and photos

Information on expected rental income

Contract terms and conditions

Full guidance throughout the purchase process

The Abbreviated Information Document is available.
Expenses: Taxes (ITP or VAT + Stamp Duty) + notary and registry fees.FS1

property_description:
Exclusive Investment Opportunity in the Costa del Sol
1-Bedroom Hotel Apartment in Bel Air

Discover a unique opportunity to own a hotel-style apartment on the Costa del Sol that blends personal enjoyment with smart investment. Located within the well-regarded Bakour Oh Nice resort in Bel Air, this one-bedroom apartment offers owners access to luxurious 4-star amenities while generating a steady annual return.
This unit is part of a professionally managed hotel complex with a proven track record of increasing profitability. Under the care of a newly appointed management company, many facilities have been recently renovated, enhancing both guest experience and investment value.
The apartment cannot be used as a permanent residence, in line with Andalusian tourism regulations (Law 13/2001). However, as the owner, you can enjoy the property for up to 8 weeks per year, making it an ideal solution for those seeking a hassle-free holiday home with a financial return.

Key Features:
• Comfortable 1-bedroom unit within a professionally run hotel resort
• Annual rental income managed by the operator
• Access to full hotel services and amenities, including:
Outdoor swimming pools and tropical gardens
Fully equipped gym and wellness spa
Restaurants, café, and seasonal chiringuito
Children’s area and high-season entertainment
Laundry, reception, and housekeeping services
• Recently updated communal areas and ongoing improvement plans
• No community or maintenance fees — all covered by the operator
• Only fixed expense: annual IBI (property tax)

Location:
The Bakour Oh Nice resort is ideally situated in Bel Air, a quiet and well-connected area between Marbella, Benahavís, and Estepona. With nearby golf courses, beaches, restaurants, and shopping options, it provides the perfect blend of relaxation and convenience.

Whether you're a seasoned investor or a lifestyle buyer seeking a low-maintenance holiday escape, this property offers a compelling combination of income potential, prime location, and Mediterranean charm.

Contact us today for more details or to request the management agreement.

The abbreviated information document is available to you. Expenses: Taxes (ITP or VAT+AJD) + Notarial and registration expenses.
NG1.

property_description:
GREAT INVESTMENT OPPORTUNITY
Nice and cosy apartment for sale in Manilva. The apartment has one bedroom, one bathroom, equipped kitchen and living room. It is situated in an authentic Andalusian holiday village, with two pools, a restaurant, bar and views to the street of Gibraltar. In the urbanisation you can find a space for children, a space to play football, basketball and handball. It is located 500m from the sea. A rental contract is in place. The complex is gated, providing security, which is an attractive feature for potential tenants and buyers​.And the harbour and beach of Sotogrande just 5 minutes away by car.

DETAILS TO HIGHLIGHT: This apartment offers a fixed annual return. You can enjoy your apartment for personal use for 2 months per year, and for the rest of the year, it is rented out, allowing you to make a profit without having to worry about anything, as the Holiday village takes care of everything for you.

property_description:
BEST PRICE AROUND ! EASY, NO HASSLE * YEARLY RETURN * 60 DAYS FREE USE
***Very nice Tourist Apartment located in the urbanization of Bahía de las Rocas, Village Club site in Terrazas Costa del Sol in Manilva.

The Apartment consists of 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. South-west orientation. Fully equipped kitchen. Air conditioning. Good qualities and built-in wardrobes. Extensive communal garden areas, swimming pool with relaxation areas, paddle tennis court, parking, etc...
The complex is distributed in 4 blocks of flats surrounded by large green areas and a swimming pool with sea views that offers a relaxed lifestyle in an unbeatable location.

Property whose purpose is tourist exploitation, it is not possible to reside as a habitual residence.

This Tourist Apartment (AT) is currently being managed by Pierre & Vacances with a current annual fixed rent of approximately €7,000. The buyer would have to take over the current lease, in force until October 31, 2027. This contract is automatically renewed every 10 years, unless the community of owners communicates its intention to terminate it 1 year in advance and proposes another management company.

The complex operates in high season from June to October, rest of the year without activity. The owner can enjoy it for 60 days a year outside the operating period of the Management Company.

Beautiful and extensive common areas with beautiful views of the sea, the Strait of Gibraltar and even the African mountains! Very quiet residential complex, surrounded by mountains. 5 minutes by car from the beach. Good communications.

Come and visit it and feel the sea breeze nearby.

VISIT IT WITHOUT COMMITMENT, 0% commission to buyers for this asset.

property_description:
ATENTION INVESTORS ONLY.
If you're looking for an investment on the Costa del Sol that provides a return and allows you to enjoy it whenever you want without worrying about anything more than a few small annual expenses, this is a great opportunity.
Room for sale in a hotel complex with increasing profitability.
The hotel has new management and many of its facilities have been renovated.
The complex has a swimming pool, gym, laundry, children's area, entertainment during high season, restaurants, a spa, tropical gardens, housekeeping service, and more.
With the purchase, you'll get a return on your investment while enjoying its 4-star hotel-class facilities whenever you want.
The expenses you'll incur are the annual property tax. The use of the property is transferred to the operator, who will cover the costs of utilities, community fees, and maintenance. All you have to worry about is receiving your return and enjoying it whenever you want.
It cannot be used as a long-term home.
For more information, we provide the opereting contract
